data.title: My first Christmas without Andy Williams
data.meta_description: I have had a crush on Andy Williams ever since I heard him sing "Moon River" at the 1962 Academy Awards. He and his turtleneck sweaters, holiday TV specials and eight Christmas albums were as much a part of my family's annual tradition as hot cider, corn pudding and being forbidden from opening presents until…
